data.title: Is Darius McCrary Gay? Is He Really Gay Or Just Rumors Around Him?
data.meta_description: An American actor, singer, and producer, Darius Creston McCrary, was born on May 1, 1976. He is widely known for his character of Edward "Eddie" Winslow, who
data.text:
An American actor, singer, and producer, Darius Creston McCrary, was born on May 1, 1976. He is widely known for his character of Edward “Eddie” Winslow, who acted as the eldest kid in Family Matters, a TV sitcom between 1989 and 1998.

McCrary’s acting career started in his childhood; thus, he debuted in the film industry by being featured in a comedy called Big Shots (1987), apart from voicing Jazz in Transformers (2007). However, people have become more interested in “Is Eddie Winslow Gay?”

Is Thomas Doherty Bisexual? Actor’s Sexuality Explored

Is Darius McCrary Gay? (Is Eddie From Family Matters Gay?)

Darius McCrary says he is straight (heterosexual). A person’s sexual orientation is a personal part of who they are. It is respectful to describe someone’s sexual orientation the way they identify it themselves. We will update you when McCrary shares more information about his gender identity in the future.

Why did Rumors About His Sexual Orientation Begin?

The talk about Darius McCrary’s sexual orientation started because of guesses about his friendship with transgender model Sidney Starr. When a video of them kissing spread online, people began wondering if they were dating. This made folks assume things about McCrary’s sexual orientation.

However, McCrary has said he and Sidney Starr are just friends, not dating. He has also cleared up incorrect rumours about his sexual orientation in the past, stating clearly that he is not gay.

Even though they’ve denied a romantic relationship, McCrary’s interactions with Sidney Starr fueled more gossip and assumptions about his sexual orientation. This situation shows how public figures face a lot of prying eyes and judgments about their personal lives.

While curiosity is natural, it’s important to remember that a person’s sexual orientation is private information. Making assumptions without facts can be unfair and hurtful. The best approach is to respect McCrary’s statements about his identity and personal relationships.

What Is Darius McCrary’s Response To The Rumors?

Darius McCrary responded to the rumours about his sexuality and relationship with transgender model Sidney Starr by denying these claims. The speculation and viral video of them kissing notwithstanding, McCrary has been clear that he is not romantically involved in a relationship with Sidney Starr.

In a video addressing the rumors, McCrary highlighted that he does not listen to rumor mongers but encourages them to focus on positive things like changing the world rather than wasting time gossiping about his personal life. Additionally, McCrary’s former sitcom mom, Jo Marie Payton, was present in the video and denied this, stating that “it is not true.” This response from McCrary reiterates his stand on the rumors and his resolve to guard his privacy against false information concerning his private life.

Who Is Darius McCrary’s Wife?

Darius McCrary has been married three times. Here is a brief timeline of his relationships:

Juliette Vann (2005 – 2006)

Las Vegas showgirl Juliette Vann was McCrary’s first wife. Their dating started in 2005, and they tied the knot after just four months into their relationship. Albeit short-lived, their union ended in 2006.

Karrine Steffans (2009 – 2011)

McCrary married Karrine Steffans, an author, in 2009 as his second wife who wrote the Vixen book series.

Tammy Brawner (2014 – 2017)

They married in 2014, but McCrary and Tammy Brawner divorced in 2017.

Darius McCrary is not married but engaged to Tanya James, Rick James’ ex-wife. Rumors swirled about a potential romance between him and trans model Sidney Starr. Still, the actor categorically denied that they were dating. As of 2024, Darius McCrary’s relationship status is uncertain.
